an7.40:1: "Bhikkhus, possessing seven qualities, a bhikkhu exercises mastery over his mind and is not a servant of his mind. What seven? Here, () a bhikkhu is skilled in concentration, (2) skilled in the attainment of concentration, (3) skilled in the duration of concentration, (4) skilled in emergence from concentration, (5) skilled in fitness for concentration, (6) skilled in the area of concentration, and (7) skilled in resolution regarding concentration.[n.499] Six of these skills, excluding the first, are mentioned atAN6.24.Possessing these seven qualities, a bhikkhu exercises mastery over his mind, and is not a servant of his mind."
